function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased density enabling transmission of infectious diseases","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread and harder to control outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improved sanitation, social distancing measures, and access to public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for better urban planning and resource allocation","People":"Residents of high-density urban areas","Owner":"Local governments and urban planners"},{"Description":"Limited access to resources in peri-urban and suburban areas","Impact":"Increased chance of exposure to new types of viruses and diseases","Mitigation":"Improving access to public health resources and education on wildlife interactions","Technologies":"Mobile health units and telemedicine for remote areas","People":"Residents of peri-urban and suburban areas","Owner":"Local health authorities and community leaders"},{"Description":"Connectivity as a risk factor for disease spread","Impact":"Speed and scale of disease transmission influenced by connectivity","Mitigation":"Monitoring of travel patterns and implementing targeted containment measures","Technologies":"Network analysis and surveillance systems for tracking travel patterns","People":"Travelers and communities with high connectivity","Owner":"Public health authorities and transportation agencies"}]}
